page.title: 02 THE HOUSING ESTATES
page.content: The residential zone is to the south of the area.The first large housing estates were built about 1960,and some are still being built.There are a few older houses on the edge of Colebrook. The estate houses are mostly semi- detached.A few are detached. Some of the older houses have been modernized.Some houses have had extensions or garages built.Some houses have had old windows and doors replaced with double glazed,aluminium or plastic units. Over half of the houses in this area have had some kind of extra weather proofing ,like pebble dash,stone or tile cladding or water proof paint. Some houses have solar heating panels fixed on their roof.A couple of people have balconies built on,and some houses have burglar alarms as well.
